Ryo, outside Alliance base's scanning range would be aproaching 
(about two thirds of the way) the Cybertronian Fire. Are you saying 
that you crashed the hologram near the CF?






--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "RYO D" <striderzero1@h...> wrote:
> OOC: This is attack phase 2 if you get this before part one wait it 
will get 
> there I hope.
> 
> ::Inu-Yasha::
> Watches the timer in his optics "Ok My move" Inu activates his 
cloak and 
> flies up extremely high above the registered Air defense sweeps of 
the 
> Alliance base.
> 
> ::Koj::
> Cuts on the projector and enters his Tekno battle mode and gets 
ready to 
> make a running start.
> 
> ::The Holo Image::
> As a medium sized ship looking like its been through hell streams 
toward the 
> defense grid.
> 
> ::Inu-Yasha::
> Inu goes on all com frequencys as he watches the image "This is the 
White 
> Tiger My ship has taken heavy damage I'm not going to make it I'm 
launching 
> 5 pods this my crew please help them......." the transmission ends 
suddenly.
> 
> ::The Holo Image::
> The ship explodes before reaching the Alliance ((estimated)) scan 
grid.
> 
> ::Inu-Yasha::
> Activates the 5 Stasis pod's transwarp cells each takes off 
streaming toward 
> driffent points around the Alliance base outside there shield area.
((Whoever 
> goes after each of the pods from the moment you get in range 5ft 
stop or try 
> to open stop if you like.))
> 
> ::Koj::
> Koj gets ready to rush in the second shields. Koj Chants Slowly in 
his head 
> and the bracelet play music for him alittle louder "You can't hero 
hiding 
> underneath your bed."  switchs his jets to silent running.
